data.name: description_today
data.value: Here is how your day is looking so far

data.name: five_ways_to_wellbeing_description
data.value: The five ways to wellbeing provide areas of focus that help you maintain positive mental wellbeing. Think of it as your five a day for your mental wellbeing!

data.name: wellbeing_connect_description
data.value: Connect is all about building relationships, in person or over video call it all counts, what really matters is that you spend time getting to know each other deeply, build a sense of trust, go deeper than the superficial, and most importantly make time to listen.

data.name: wellbeing_be_active_description
data.value: Be active is all about getting in some exercise, whether that be grabbing your yoga mat and taking on the downward dog, going for a short walk during your lunch break or training for your next marathon, make sure to keep it at a level you are comfortable with, if you don't feel better, change it up until you find something you love.

data.name: wellbeing_take_notice_description
data.value: Take notice is all about taking the time to reflect, look at the bigger picture, how was your day today? Make the most of the little things, put that phone down, stop scrolling. Ah, that's better, now you can enjoy the moment.

data.name: wellbeing_keep_learning_description
data.value: Keep learning is all about taking time to learn what you love. Growing your skills and finding a real sense of achievement in what you love to do. Whether it be a new skill or String Theory, get out there and start learning.

data.name: wellbeing_give_description
data.value: Giving is all about using what you have to benefit someone else. Whether that be giving a smile or a quick nod of the head to a stranger as you pass by or donning the apron for a charity bake sale, it all counts.
